name: Neobug Rush 2 Players
description:
Play together with your friends on one device or practice with computer opponents!

Game rules are very easy:
- tap bug buttons to create bugs
- purple bugs deal double damage to green bugs
- blue bugs deal double damage to purple bugs
- green bugs deal double damage to blue bugs
- bugs cost no vitality when you see gold infinity icon in the beginning of a battle, so tap as fast as you can!

Moreover, neobug-DJ will turn on his toughest tracks, so it will be fun!
